tool_description: App to make calls to retrieve football data for analysis and visualisation.
name: footballData
title: footballData

api_list.name: Endpoint1
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://footballdata.p.rapidapi.com/footballData"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "footballdata.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://footballdata.p.rapidapi.com/footballData"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "footballdata.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
